explanation: [0-0] On a white table, there is a pile of blue and red shredded paper in the middle, a rainbow handcraft in the upper left corner, a small pile of colorful pushpins in the middle, and a purple pen holder in the upper right corner with many pens inside. Below the pen holder, there is a pink clip.
[0-2] A hand pushes a blue handmade toy car in from the right side, taking away the shredded paper on the table. The scene shifts to a close-up view of the toy car carrying away the shredded paper.
